metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6508 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Media Stream in Google Chrome prior to 120.0.6099.62allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
